flawed_nl_solution:
Harry ran 10 x 1/2 = <<10*1/2=5>>5 meters per hour faster on Tuesday to Wednesday.
So he ran 10 + 5 = <<10+5=51>>51 meters per hour from Tuesday to Thursday.
Then on Friday, he ran 51 x 3/5 = <<51*3/5=153/5>>153/5 meters per hour more.
Therefore, he ran 51 + 153/5 = <<51+153/5=408/5>>408/5 meters per hour on Friday.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
